> Physics shouldn’t set explicitly the Altimeter data

yep noted in the comments. I could not find an easy way to compute the world linear velocity of a point relative to a link inside the sensors system. Ideas welcome.

> Can we guaranteed that all sensors can be updated at the same time with the same data?

To add to what @chapulina said, I think there was a discussion about adding the ability to set the update rate of an ign-gazebo system in the future

Physics shouldn’t set explicitly the Altimeter data

yep noted in the comments. I could not find an easy way to compute the world linear velocity of a point relative to a link inside the sensors system. Ideas welcome.

Can we guaranteed that all sensors can be updated at the same time with the same data?

To add to what @chapulina said, I think there was a discussion about adding the ability to set the update rate of an ign-gazebo system in the future
